snippet: In academia, questions are left unanswered and nothing gets done. That is how it should be.
abstract: In academia, questions are left unanswered and nothing gets done. That is how it should be.
lead_paragraph: I try not to write the same column twice, at least not knowingly.  But I have just come back from still another conference on originalism held, as it was last year, at the University of San Diego law school, and I was struck once again by the academic purity of the occasion.

headline.main: Politics in the Academy: The Same Old Song
